DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate Triathlon® PKR Knee System determine whether success rate device worse report success rate similar device .
DOC.brief_title: Triathlon® Partial Knee Replacement ( PKR ) Outcomes Study
DOC.criteria: The subject male nonpregnant female 2175 year age time enrollment . The subject require primary cemented unicompartmental knee replacement . The subject diagnosis osteoarthritis ( OA ) posttraumatic arthritis ( TA ) . The subject clinically intact cruciate collateral ligament ligamentous instability present . The subject le 10 degree flexion contracture great 90 degree flexion . The subject 's preoperative mechanical alignment le 10 degree varus 10 degree valgus . The subject sign IRB approve study specific Informed Patient Consent Form . The subject willing able comply postoperative schedule clinical radiographic evaluation rehabilitation . The subject inflammatory arthritis avascular necrosis ( AVN ) . The subject obese , BMI > 35 . The subject history total unicompartmental ( contralateral compartment and/or patellofemoral joint ) reconstruction affect joint . The subject history ACL reconstruction . The subject high distal femoral , proximal tibial osteotomy . The subject mental , neuromuscular neurosensory disorder , would create unacceptable risk prosthesis instability , prosthesis fixation failure , complication postoperative care and/or limit ability assess performance device . The subject systemic metabolic disorder lead progressive bone deterioration surgeon feel would affect overall outcome study . The subject immunologically suppress , receive chronic steroid ( > 30 day duration ) . The subject know sensitivity device material . The subject 's bone stock compromise disease and/or infection provide adequate support and/or fixation prosthesis . The subject 's bone stock compromise prior implantation provide adequate support and/or fixation prosthesis . The subject active suspect latent infection knee joint . The subject prisoner .
